name: tweetnacl
description: Port of TweetNaCl cryptographic library to JavaScript

scripts.build: terser nacl.js -c -m -o nacl.min.js && terser nacl-fast.js -c -m -o nacl-fast.min.js
scripts.test-node-all: make -C test/c && tape test/*.js test/c/*.js | faucet
scripts.build-test-browser: browserify test/browser/init.js test/*.js | terser -c -m -o test/browser/_bundle.js 2>/dev/null && browserify test/browser/init.js test/*.quick.js | terser -c -m -o test/browser/_bundle-quick.js 2>/dev/null

author: TweetNaCl-js contributors
